sidebar_nav.specs: Vertical navigation, logo at top, user profile/logout at bottom. Active state: bg-white/10 text-white. Inactive: text-slate-400 hover:text-white hover:bg-white/5.

hero_section.specs: Split layout. Left: Text (H1, Subtext, CTA). Right: Abstract 3D/Geometric Image. Background: Clean light with subtle mesh gradient.

services_grid.specs: Bento grid layout. Cards with icons, title, description. Hover effect: Scale up slightly, border color change.

contact_form.specs: Two column. Left: Contact Info (Phone, Email, Address). Right: Form. Fields: Name, Email, Phone, Project Name, Description, File Upload (Drag & Drop, max 4 files).

auth_modal.specs: Shadcn Dialog. Tabs for Login/Register. Fields: Email, Password. Validation: Zod schema.

file_upload.specs: Custom dropzone. Dashed border. State: Idle, DragOver, FileSelected. List selected files with 'remove' (x) button.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. Install dependencies: `npm install lucide-react clsx tailwind-merge framer-motion react-hook-form @hookform/resolvers zod`.
2. Configure Tailwind: Add 'Outfit' and 'Plus Jakarta Sans' to font family. Add custom colors.
3. Create the Layout first: Sidebar (Fixed Left) + Main Content Wrapper.
4. Implement the 'AuthModal' using a Dialog component. It should be accessible from the Sidebar 'Login' button.
5. Build the 'ContactForm' with a custom File Upload UI. Do not use a raw input type='file'. Create a visual dropzone.
6. Ensure the Sidebar is responsive. On mobile, it should be a drawer/sheet triggered by a hamburger menu.
7. Use the provided image URLs for the respective sections.
8. Apply 'data-testid' to all interactive elements (buttons, inputs, links).
universal_guidelines: Avoid generic 'AI slop' designs. Use asymmetric grids and generous spacing.
Dark colors should be rich (tinted with blue), not pure black.
Micro-interactions are mandatory (hover states, focus rings).
Do not use 'Inter' for headings. Use 'Outfit'.
